abstract: The Walt Disney Company and Cablevision each told viewers to take a side — their side — in a brewing battle over distribution payments that are increasingly seen as a vital for television broadcasters.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company and Cablevision each told viewers to take a side — their side — in a brewing battle over distribution payments that are increasingly seen as a vital for television broadcasters.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Company and Cablevision each told viewers to take a side — their side — on Tuesday in a brewing battle over distribution payments that are increasingly seen as a vital for television broadcasters.

headline.main: Disney, Cablevision Go Public in Fight Over WABC Fees

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Brooks Barnes
